pkgmetadata.longdescription: Best Subset GLM and Regression Utilities // Best subset glm using information criteria or cross-validation, carried by using 'leaps' algorithm (Furnival and Wilson, 1974) doi:10.2307/1267601 or complete enumeration (Morgan and Tatar, 1972) doi:10.1080/00401706.1972.10488918. Implements PCR and PLS using AIC/BIC. Implements one-standard deviation rule for use with the 'caret' package.
